title: Random Story Generator
description: Web app that generates a random story upon user input

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: User enters prompt and views generated story

pages.name: Story
pages.purpose: Generated story is displayed to the user

interactions.name: Enter User Prompt
interactions.description: User enters text into prompt input field

interactions.name: Generate Button Clicked
interactions.description: Generate button is clicked, generating a random story

acceptance_criteria: The app displays the user's entered prompt at the top of the page
When the generate button is clicked, the app generates and displays a new random story within 1 second
The generated story includes at least one character, setting, and plot point
